meanings.definition: The action of reducing a material into small particles.
meanings.sent1: The comminution of the rock into tiny pieces was done using a hammer.
meanings.sent2: The comminution of coffee beans results in a finer powder for brewing.
meanings.sent3: The comminution of the cookie crumbs made a mess on the kitchen floor.
meanings.sent4: The comminution of the ice resembled a snowstorm in a blender.
meanings.sent5: The comminution of the paper created a cloud of confetti in the air.

meanings.definition: The process of grinding or pulverizing a substance into fine particles.
meanings.sent1: The comminution of spices in a mortar and pestle releases their flavors.
meanings.sent2: The comminution of wheat grains produces flour for baking.
meanings.sent3: The comminution of the chocolate bar made it easier to share with friends.
meanings.sent4: The comminution of the metal turned it into a shimmering dust.
meanings.sent5: The comminution of the salt crystals made them dissolve quickly in water.
